thread.title: How to get a free Subway sandwich this Valentine's Day
thread.title_full: How to get a free Subway sandwich this Valentine's Day

author: Simon Coyle
title: How to get a free Subway sandwich this Valentine's Day
text:
How to get a free Subway sandwich this Valentine's Day You can get a free six inch sub - but for today only Share (Photo: Getty Images North America) Share Get What's On updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
They say there is no such thing as a free lunch - well there is at Subway today. Kind of. 
To shows customers some love on Valentine's Day the popular sandwich chain is giving away free six inch subs. 
The move is part of its giveaway called 'Customer Appreciation Day'. 
There is of course a little bit of a catch. 
To get your sub all you have to do is visit a store between 11am and 7pm and buy a dispensed drink, or bottle of water - which cost around £1.50. 
You can then claim any sub for free. (Photo: Getty Images North America) Read More 11 ridiculous TripAdvisor reviews of McDonalds in Manchester 
So if you fancy a steak and cheese or meatball marinara then fill your boots. 
The deal isn’t valid for double meat or extra cheese and is limited to one per guest per visit. 
More than 40 chains across Manchester are taking part in the promotion. You can see if your local Subway is listed here . 
And that's not all as Subway are also giving away free cookies this month. 
The 'cookies for cookies' scheme is a simple one: if you visit the company's web page and click 'allow' on the cookie notification, you'll then be emailed a voucher that you can redeem in store. Read More
